__ATTN__: Do not edit this file; changes belong in the appropriate YAML file.

tests.name: Basic Behavior
tests.desc: The greater-than operator should expand to the named partial.

tests.name: Context
tests.desc: The greater-than operator should operate within the current context.

tests.name: Recursion
tests.desc: The greater-than operator should properly recurse.

tests.name: Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: The greater-than operator should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Standalone Indentation
tests.desc: Each line of the partial should be indented before rendering.

tests.name: Padding Whitespace
tests.desc: Superfluous in-tag whitespace should be ignored.
